trinkets.description: When you scout during the rally phase, if there are no nearby enemies, you may deplete this item to prepare 1 additional card.

trinkets.name: Long-Stemmed Pipe
trinkets.description: When you scout during the rally phase, if there are no nearby enemies, you may deplete this item to prepare 1 additional card and discard 2 facedown fear.

trinkets.name: Storm-Maker
trinkets.description: When you scout during the rally phase, if there are no nearby enemies, you may deplete this item to prepare 1 additional card and discard 2 facedown fear, and gain a boon of your choice.

trinkets.name: Old Scepter
trinkets.description:
You have ther Elf, Dwarf, and Hobbit traits.
After you interact with a person token, you may deplete this item to gain 1 inspiration.

trinkets.name: Silver Scepter
trinkets.description:
You have ther Elf, Dwarf, and Hobbit traits.
After you interact with a person token, you may deplete this item to gain 1 inspiration or discard 1 fear.

trinkets.name: The Silent Scepter
trinkets.description:
You have ther Elf, Dwarf, and Hobbit traits.
After you interact with a person token, you may deplete this item for you or a nearby hero to gain 2 inspiration and discard 1 fear.

trinkets.name: Provisions
trinkets.description: At the end of your turn, you may deplete this item to scout 1.  For each creature card in your play area, reveal 1 additional card.

trinkets.name: Wayfarer's Provisions
trinkets.description: During your turn, you may deplete this item to scout 1.  For each creature card in your play area, reveal 1 additional card.

trinkets.name: Horselord Supplu
trinkets.description: During your turn, you may deplete this item to scout 1.  For each creature card in your play area, reveal 1 additional card.

trinkets.name: Rope
trinkets.description: When you interact with a token and test Might or Agility, you may deplete this item to convert 1 fate to 1 success.

trinkets.name: Hobson Rope
trinkets.description:
When you interact with a token, if you would test Might, you may test Agility instead.
When you interact with a token and test Might or Agility, you may deplete this item to convert 1 fate to 1 success.

trinkets.name: Ninnyhammer Braid
trinkets.description:
When you interact with a token, if you would test Might, you may test Agility instead.
When you interact with a token and test Might or Agility, you may deplete this item to convert 1 fate to 2 success.

trinkets.name: The Crown of Shadows
trinkets.description:
You may equip 1 additional trinket.
When you test, you may deplete this trinket to add success equal to your corruption.

trinkets.name: Tome
trinkets.description: When you scout, you may deplete this item to reveal 2 additional cards.

trinkets.name: Tome of Battle
trinkets.description: When you scout, you may deplete this item to reveal 2 additional cards.  If you do and there is an enemy in your space, gain 1 inspiration.

trinkets.name: Legendarium of Thror
trinkets.description: When you scout, you may deplete this item to reveal 2 additional cards and prepare 1 additional card.  If you do and there is an enemy in your space, gain 1 inspiration.

trinkets.name: Torch
trinkets.description: You and other heroes in your space ignore darkness.

trinkets.name: Weathertop Torch
trinkets.description:
You and other heroes in your space ignore darkness.
If you attack an enemy in your space, you may deplete this item to add pierce or smite.

trinkets.name: Under-Sun
trinkets.description:
You and other heroes in your space ignore darkness.
If you attack an enemy in your space, you may deplete this item to add pierce, smite, and stun.

trinkets.name: Waterskin
trinkets.description: When you travel, you may deplete this item to move 1 additional space.

trinkets.name: Elven Waterskin
trinkets.description: When you travel, you may deplete this item to move 1 additional space.

trinkets.name: Clear-Water
trinkets.description:
Increase your fear limit by 1.
When you travel, you may deplete this item to move 1 additional space.

supports.name: Banner
supports.description: After you or a nearby hero rests or guards, that hero gains 1 inspiration.

supports.name: Dunedain Banner
supports.description: After you or a nearby hero rests, guards or hides, that hero gains 1 inspiration.

supports.name: War-Haven
supports.description:
After you or a nearby hero rests, guards or hides, that hero gains 1 inspiration.
After you discard a prepared tactic card, you or a nearby hero may discard 1 facedown damage or fear.

supports.name: War-Maker
supports.description:
1 Success: Cleave
1 Success: 2 hits
After you or a nearby hero rests, guards, or hides, that hero gains 1 inspiration.

supports.name: Hope's Beacon
supports.description: After you or a nearby hero rests, guards, hides, or discards a prepared tactic or valour skill, that hero may chose 1: gain 1 inspiration, scout 1, discard a bane, or discard 1 facedown damage or fear.

supports.name: Harp
supports.description: At the start of your turn, a hero in your space who has 0 inspiration gains 1 inspiration.

supports.name: Forlindon Harp
supports.description:
At the start of your turn, a hero in your space who has 0 inspiration gains 1 inspiration.
If a hero in your space would gain an inspiration, they may discard a facedown fear instead.

supports.name: Heart's-Rest
supports.description:
At the start of your turn, a hero in your space who has 0 inspiration gains 1 inspiration.
If a hero in your space would gain an inspiration, they may discard a facedown damage or fear instead.

supports.name: River-Calling
supports.description:
1 Success: Stun
1 Success: Gain 1 inspiration
At the start of your turn, up to 2 heroes in your space who have 0 inspiration gain 1 inspiration.

supports.name: Chorus of Light
supports.description:
Each hero increases their inspiration limit by 2.
At the start of your turn, a hero in your space gains 1 inspiration.
1 success: Stun, smite

supports.name: Horn
supports.description: At the start of your turn, if you are in a space with an enemy, you or a nearby hero gains 1 inspiration.

supports.name: Horn
supports.description: At the start of your turn, if you are in a space with an enemy, you or a nearby hero gains 1 inspiration.

supports.name: Gondorian Horn
supports.description:
At the start of your turn, if you are in a space with an enemy, you or a nearby hero gains 1 inspiration.
If a nearby hero would gain an inspiration, they may become emboldened instead.

supports.name: Sentry's Horn
supports.description:
At the start of your turn, if you are in a space with an enemy, you or a nearby hero gains 1 inspiration.
Once per round, when you or a nearby hero scouts, that hero may reveal 1 additional card.

supports.name: Starsong
supports.description:
At the start of your turn, if you are in a space with an enemy, you and a nearby hero gain 1 inspiration.
Once per round, you may discard a song card for a nearby hero to discard 1 fear or damage.

supports.name: Ringing Glory
supports.description:
1 Success: Lethal
At the start of your turn, if you are in a space with an enemy, you and a nearby hero gain 1 inspiration.

supports.name: Clarion Call
supports.description:
At the start of your turn, if you are in a space with an enemy, you or a nearby hero gain 1 inspiration.
After you attack, you may spend 2 inspiration for a nearby hero to also attack.

supports.name: Thunderclap
supports.description:
1 success: Lethal
1 success: A nearby hero may move 1 space without provoking attacks.
At the start of your turn, you or a nearby hero gains 1 inspiration.

supports.name: Shield
supports.description: Once per round, when you would suffer any amount of damage, you may prevent 1 damage.

supports.name: Reinforced Shield
supports.description: Once per round, when you would suffer any amount of damage, you may prevent 1 damage and prepare a skill with guard from your discard pile.

supports.name: Bossed Shield
supports.description:
Once per round, when you would suffer any amount of damage, you may prevent 1 damage.
Before you provoke an enemy, apply 2 hits and pierce to that enemy.

supports.name: Ironhide
supports.description:
Once per round, when you would suffer any amount of damage, you may prevent 2 damage and prepare a skill with guard from your discard pile.
Increase your damage limit by 1.

supports.name: Flame-Guard
supports.description:
1 Success: 2 hits
Once per round, when you would suffer any amount of damage, you may prevent 2 damage and prepare a skill with guard from your discard pile.

supports.name: Foe-Blind
supports.description:
1 Success: Stun
Once per round, when you would suffer any amount of damage, you may prevent 2 damage and prepare a skill with guard from your discard pile.

supports.name: Hrinanbenn
supports.description:
Once per round, when you would suffer any amount of damage, you may prevent 2 damage and prepare a skill from your discard pile.
Once per round, after an enemy moves into your space, you may apply stun to that enemy.

mounts.name: Friendly Pony
mounts.description: Once per round, after you perform a Spirit test, a hero in your space may gain 1 inspiration or flip 1 fear facedown.  If you are a Hobbit, that hero may do both.

mounts.name: Grumble Bum
mounts.description:
1 success: 3 hits
2 success: 3 hits, cleave
Once per round when you are counterattacked, you may reduce that damage and fear by 1.

mounts.name: Meadow Hart
mounts.description:
Once per round, after you move during your turn, you may apply 2 hits to each enemy in your space.
1 success: Become determined

mounts.name: Pack Mule
mounts.description:
You can have up to 2 additional prepared skills. 
Once per round, when you would discard a prepared skill, you may place that skill on top of your deck instead.

mounts.name: Quickbeam
mounts.description:
You cannot sprint.
1 success: 2 hits
2 success: 3 hits, stun
Once per round, when you attack, you may add cleave to that attack.

mounts.name: Snowbright
mounts.description: Once per round, after you or a nearby hero suffers damage or fear, that hero may gain 1 inspiration.

mounts.name: Swift Steed
mounts.description:
Once per round, when you move out of a space, you may ignore enemies in that space.
At the end of your turn, if you moved 3 or more spaces this turn, gain 1 inspiration.

mounts.name: Traveller's Horse
mounts.description:
Heroes up to 2 spaces away are nearby you.  You are nearby heroes up to 2 spaces away.
Action: Interact with a token in an adjacent space.  You may only use this action once per round.

mounts.name: War Charger
mounts.description:
1 success: 2 hits
Once per round, when you attack, you may add sunder and stun to that attack.

mounts.name: Witness of Maranwe
mounts.description:
Once per round, when you attack, you may target an enemy 1 additional space away.
Action: Flip this card to place your figure in a space with another hero (this does not provoke attacks).
